name: Splatter Faith 3D [FAN REMAKE]
description:
Install instructions

Hello everyone, the Bloodishman team is with you the Software and we present you a game, or called SplatterFaith3D.
Plot:
Kanako Yasaka was abducted by the Red UFO, which flew in from the planet VOMIZ. Suwako Moriah trusts Sanae Kochiyu with her hat and sends Sanae to the Red UFO to try to save Kanako.
Features:
-Cool music
-Multiple levels
-3 types of guns
-Worked graphics
-And much more!
